description:
Get the star treatment with our gorgeous Embellir Make-up Mirror. Framed with 18 LED bulbs, this mirror really lights up your visage for your daily makeup regimen. The metal frame is sturdy, lightweight, and adds a glistening touch of glamour to the entire mirror. The frame sits on an equally smooth powder coated MDF base for stability and durability. Even more wonderful is that the LED light can be easily adjusted for brightness and colour temperature using touch controls: choose from cool white, daylight and warm yellow. Turn your bedroom or bathroom into a celebrity VIP set overnight with our make-up mirror, and enjoy beauty in all its illuminated brilliance.

Features
18 x LED bulbs
Three colour temperatures
Intelligent brightness
5X magnifying mirror
Touch controls
Stable metal base
Free standing or wall mounted
SAA-approved

Specifications:
Frame material: Metal
Type: Touch controls
LED bulb quantity: 18
Size: 65cm x 80cm
Assembly Required: Yes
Number of packages: one

Package Content
Embellir Makeup Mirror x1
AU adapter x1
Magnifying small mirror x1
Cleaning cloth x1

This product comes with 1 year warranty
name: Embellir 1EACH
